result.eng: How often do you go to plays? - Very seldom.

result.eng: The biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ga: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.orig: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.html: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ponchtml: An rud is mó atá le taḃairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná ċoṁ hamaitéaraċ is a ḃí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.

result.eng: They moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ga: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.orig: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.html: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na PolainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ponchtml: Ḃog siad go dtí an Ḟrainc mar is maiṫ a d'airiġ siad an ċontúirt a ḃí ann do Ġiúdaiġ na PolainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.

result.eng: How are you? - You can see yourself how we are.

result.ponchtml: Goidé mar atá siḃ - Goidé mar ḃeimis aċ mar tí tú féinHow are you? - You can see yourself how we are.

result.eng: Her eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ga: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.orig: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici

result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ḋá ẛúil dearg ar ṁéad is a ḃí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.

result.eng: How closely related are we?
